nodes.title: 9 Ways to Win a Hackathon... Without Coming in First Place
nodes.excerpt: Originally posted at  https://cult.honeypot.io/reads/how-to-win-a-hackathon See discussion on  HackerNews From my experience at hackathons…
nodes.description: To win first place at a hackathon, you need to combine multiple components... and that's not always possible. Here's how to make the most of your next hackathon without coming in 'first place'.
